  1. News & Announcements


    View All News & Events

  1. Weekly Update April 10, 2019

    Read on...

  2. Public Participation at Board of Supervisors Meetings

    Effective immediately, citizens who wish to address the Board of Supervisors at their meetings will be asked to complete a sign-in sheet. Read on...

  3. Real Estate Tax Relief

    Find out if you qualify for Real Estate Tax Relief. Read on...

  4. April is "Surry County Clean-Up Month"

    At their meeting on Thursday, April 4, 2019, the Surry County Board of Supervisors declared April, 2019 as Surry County Clean-Up Month. Read on...

  5. Surry County's Youth and Youth Advocate Awards

    The Surry County Department of Youth and Family Resources is requesting nominations for Surry County's Outstanding Youth and Youth Advocate Awards. Read on...

  6. Land Diversification Summit

    Are you a local farmer looking for ways to diversify and produce additional income with the land that you have? Read on...

  7. Looking for Citizens to Serve on Boards and Commissions

    Want to be more aware and involved when it comes to County business? Read on...

  8. Broadband Update

    Read the latest report on the Broadband Implementation Project in Surry County. Read on...

  9. Illegal Dumping at County Solid Waste Facilities

    Board of Supervisors adopts ordinance to curtail illegal dumping. Read on...

  10. Surry County Emergency Ambulance Transport Fees

    Emergency Ambulance Transport Fees are now in place. Read on...

  11. Payment Options for HRSD Customers

    Get more information on payment options for customers of Hampton Roads Sanitation District. Read on...

  12. Website Personalization Now Available!

    With the launch of the new My Account feature, visitors to the Surry County website can now customize their viewing experience! Read on...

  13. Curbside Solid Waste Collection is Available in Surry County

    Bay Disposal operates in Surry County to handle your household waste. Read on...
